#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
const long long mod=1000000000+7;
typedef long long ll;
static int fact[10000007];

ll powx(ll a,ll b){
    if(b==0)return 1;
    if(b==1)return a%mod;
    if(b%2==1)return ((a%mod)*powx(a,b-1)%mod)%mod;
    ll y=powx(a,b/2)%mod;
    return (y*y)%mod;
}
int main()
{ int t;long long n;fact[0]=1;
cin>>t;
while(t--){
    cin>>n;
    long long ans=1;
    for(long long i=1;i<=n;i++){
            fact[i]=(fact[i-1]*i)%mod;
                ans=(ans*fact[i])%mod;
                if(ans<0)ans+=mod;
        }
    cout<<ans<<endl;
}

    return 0;
}
